synopsis.text: Guided by ambitions of stardom, three charming demon girls, Aira, Shima, and Hana, navigate the complexities of human life while pursuing their dream of becoming idols in the anime "Devidol!". As they attend school and form friendships, the trio faces numerous challenges in their quest for fame, primarily due to their lack of understanding of what it truly means to be an idol. With the support of their mentor, the compassionate yet firm Rocket-sensei, these aspiring idols embark on a hilarious and heartwarming journey filled with trials, errors, and valuable lessons.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
